name: Transit-System
description: An organized arrangement of public transportation services and routes in a particular area.

name: Public-Transit
description: A public transportation system that provides shared transportation services to the general public.

name: Routes
description: A specific path or series of connected paths that a transit vehicle follows to provide service.

name: Vehicles
description: Transit vehicles used to transport passengers, such as buses and trains.

name: Stations
description: Facilities where passengers can board and alight from transit vehicles.

name: Transit-Ridership
description: The number of passengers using a transit system or route over a given period.

name: Peak-Hours
description: The periods of time when transportation usage is highest.

name: Ridership-Data
description: Data on the number of passes sold, passenger trips taken, or passenger hours.

name: Demographics
description: Information about the characteristics of transit riders, such as age, gender, and income.
